# Introduction

Tidy Tuesday assignment #9 on Holiday Episodes from 2023-12-19 data.

# Load libraries 
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(here)
library(rcartocolor)
library(showtext)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(patchwork)
library(gganimate)
```

# Load data
```{r}
ep_genres <- read_csv(here("Tidy_Tuesday_9/data","holiday_episode_genres.csv"))
episodes <- read_csv(here("Tidy_Tuesday_9/data","holiday_episodes.csv"))

glimpse(ep_genres)
glimpse(episodes)

view(ep_genres)
view(episodes)
```
